faqs.question: How long does custom software development take?
faqs.answer: Development timelines vary based on the complexity of the project. Simple applications might take 2-3 months, while more complex enterprise solutions can take 6-12 months or more. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase and use agile methodologies to deliver value incrementally.

faqs.question: Is custom software better than off-the-shelf solutions?
faqs.answer: It depends on your specific needs. Custom software is ideal when you have unique business processes, need specific integrations, or want a competitive advantage. Off-the-shelf solutions work well for standard processes. We can help you evaluate which approach is best for your situation.

faqs.question: How do you ensure the security of custom software?
faqs.answer: Security is built into every stage of our development process. We follow secure coding practices, conduct regular security testing, implement authentication and authorization controls, encrypt sensitive data, and stay updated on the latest security vulnerabilities and patches.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with our existing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in system integration. We can connect your new software with existing databases, APIs, CRMs, ERPs, and other business systems to create a cohesive ecosystem that shares data efficiently.

faqs.question: Do you provide support after the software is launched?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We offer various maintenance and support packages to ensure your software continues to run smoothly. This includes bug fixes, security updates, performance optimization, and feature enhancements as your business needs evolve.
